feat.eposmajorum.missing.name: Missing Feat
feat.eposmajorum.missing.description: The Feat for registry name %s is missing
path.eposmajorum.missing.name: Missing Path
path.eposmajorum.missing.description: The Path for registry name %s is missing
skill.eposmajorum.missing.name: Missing Skill
skill.eposmajorum.missing.description: The Skill for registry name %s is missing
pathfeature.eposmajorum.missing.name: Missing Path Provider
pathfeature.eposmajorum.missing.descript: The Path Provider for registry name %s is missing
feat.eposmajorum.ender_resistance.name: Ender Resistance
feat.eposmajorum.ender_resistance.desc: Unlocks the 'Ender Resistance' Feat, allowing for reduced damage taken when traversing the eldritch worlds using 'Ender Pearls'
feat.eposmajorum.improvised_combat.name: Improvised Combat
feat.eposmajorum.improvised_combat.desc: Unlocks the 'Improvised Combat' Skill, allowing for increased damage while wielding a Axe, Pickaxe or Shovel
feat.eposmajorum.unarmed_strike.name: Unarmed Strike
feat.eposmajorum.unarmed_strike.descript: Unlocks 'Unarmed Strike' Skill, allowing increased damage from attacks when not wielding items
feat.eposmajorum.way_of_the_blade.name: Way of the Blade
feat.eposmajorum.way_of_the_blade.desc: Unlocks 'Way of the Blade' Skill, allowing for increased damage while wielding a sword
feat.eposmajorum.gravel_excavator.name: Gravel Excavator
feat.eposmajorum.gravel_excavator.des: Prevents falling piles of gravel landing on your head, by breaking them along side the block
feat.eposmajorum.harvest_area.name: Harvest Area
feat.eposmajorum.harvest_area.desc: Increases the potency of your pickaxes breaking area
feat.eposmajorum.miners_efficiency.name: Miner's Efficiency
feat.eposmajorum.miners_efficiency.desc: Slowly increasing the speed at which your pickaxe mines
feat.eposmajorum.obsidian_smasher.name: Obsidian Smasher
feat.eposmajorum.obsidian_smasher.desc: Unlocks the 'Obsidian Smasher' Feat, granting the user a 10 times increased speed while mining obsidian!
feat.eposmajorum.ore_extraction.name: Ore Extraction
feat.eposmajorum.ore_extraction.desc: Your long-standing knowledge of the properties of the earth, makes ore-veins crumble by your hand!
feat.eposmajorum.palm_of_excavation.name: Palm of Excavation
feat.eposmajorum.palm_of_excavation.desc: Under a swift palm, Stone is soft as wool, and Wood fragile like glass...
feat.eposmajorum.gluttonous_hunger.name: Gluttonous Hunger
feat.eposmajorum.gluttonous_hunger.desc: Unlocks the 'Gluttonous Hunger' Feat, allowing for the automatic consumption on food when hungry!
feat.eposmajorum.purity_of_body.name: Purity of Body
feat.eposmajorum.purity_of_body.desc: Your body is cleaned, true purity to the core. You resist lesser poisons and impurities of the soul
feat.eposmajorum.diamond_body.name: Diamond Body
feat.eposmajorum.diamond_body.desc: Your body is sturdy as diamond. Fully immune to poisons and with a resilience towards the corrupt
feat.eposmajorum.lucky_lure.name: Lucky Lure
feat.eposmajorum.lucky_lure.desc: Unlocks the 'Lucky Lure' Feat, granting the user an increased amount of 'Luck' while fishing!
feat.eposmajorum.spirit_of_battle.name: Spirit of Battle
feat.eposmajorum.spirit_of_battle.desc: Unlocks the 'Spirit of Battle' Feat, allowing for the absorbtion of your opponents essence, growing your strength in combat!
feat.eposmajorum.timber.name: Timber!
feat.eposmajorum.timber.desc: Trees fall before your mighty axe, felling them one by one..
path.eposmajorum.monk.name: Monk
path.eposmajorum.monk.desc: A wandering monk, traveling the path of the profound!
path.eposmajorum.miner.name: Miner
path.eposmajorum.miner.desc: A true miner's life is spelunking in the deepest crevices of the earth
path.eposmajorum.lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
path.eposmajorum.lumberjack.desc: A wielder of Axes, Protector of the Forest, Killer of Trees
path.eposmajorum.fisherman.name: Fisherman
path.eposmajorum.fisherman.desc: A tranquil profession, full of fish and the occasional boot
skill.eposmajorum.improvised_combat.name: Improvised Combat
skill.eposmajorum.improvised_combat.desc: Unlocks the 'Improvised Combat' Skill, allowing for increased damage while wielding a Axe, Pickaxe or Shovel
skill.eposmajorum.lucky_angler.name: Lucky Angler
skill.eposmajorum.lucky_angler.desc: Unlocks 'Lucky Angler' Skill, providing a passive buff to Luck and Precision when Fishing!
skill.eposmajorum.lumberjacks_efficiency: Unlocks 'Lumberjack's Efficiency' Skill, slowly increasing the speed at which your axe chops
skill.eposmajorum.unarmed_strike.name: Unarmed Strike
skill.eposmajorum.unarmed_strike.desc: Unlocks 'Unarmed Strike' Skill, allowing increased damage from attacks when not wielding items
skill.eposmajorum.way_of_the_sword.name: Way of The Sword
skill.eposmajorum.way_of_the_sword.desc: Unlocks 'Unarmed Strike' Skill, allowing increased damage from attacks when not wielding items
skill.eposmajorum.harvest_area.name: Harvest Area
skill.eposmajorum.harvest_area.desc: Unlocks 'Harvest Area', increases the potency of your pickaxes breaking area
skill.eposmajorum.miners_efficiency.name: Miner's Efficiency
skill.eposmajorum.miners_efficiency.desc: Unlocks 'Miner's Efficiency' Skill, slowly increasing the speed at which your pickaxe mines
skill.eposmajorum.palm_of_excavation.des: Unlocks 'Palm of Excavation' Skill, which provides the Monk with the ability to shape rock and stone, as easy as wool or wood!
